product_name: CamelBak Groove Filter Bottle Replacement Filters - Package of 2
long_description: Use this package of 2 replacement filters with your CamelBak Groove(TM) Filter bottle (sold separately) to turn tap water into great-tasting water you can enjoy anywhere. Package includes 2 replacement plant-based carbon filters that reduce chlorine taste and odors found in tap water; each filter is good for up to 3 mos. Using the Groove Filter bottle is an easy way to enjoy tap water rather than purchasing disposable bottles of water. Please note: the CamelBak Groove Filter bottle is for use with safe water sources only; filter does not remove viruses, bacteria or protozoa.
short_description: Use this package of 2 replacement filters with your CamelBak Groove(TM) Filter bottle (sold separately) to turn tap water into great-tasting water you can enjoy anywhere.
